dcterms:creator: American Cancer Society
dcterms:description: A dataset containing 2809 3D Digital Breast Tomosynthesis (DBT) volumes acquired from 12 different sites globally, used for breast cancer detection.
dcterms:title: Digital Breast Tomosynthesis (DBT) Dataset

dcterms:creator: X. Li
H. Chen
X. Qi
Q. Dou
C.-W. Fu
P. A. Heng
dcterms:description: A dataset from the liver lesion segmentation challenge containing 131 training and 70 testing 3D contrast-enhanced abdominal CT scans, used for liver and liver tumor segmentation.
dcterms:title: Liver Lesion Segmentation Challenge Dataset (LITS)
